articles.title: Stock Market Today: Nasdaq Closes 300 Points Lower; Nvidia Sinks on DeepSeek Threat — Live Updates - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: After China's DeepSeek prompts AI rethink, Nvidia stock slides. Follow along for live updates on stocks and other markets, including the Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite.
articles.content: Technology stocks tumbled Monday on news that Chinas DeepSeek had trained a sophisticated artificial-intelligence model at a fraction of the cost of its Silicon Valley rivals, triggering a sudden rev… [+2082 chars]

articles.author: Hayden Field
articles.title: DeepSeek hit with large-scale cyberattack, says it's limiting registrations - CNBC
articles.description: DeepSeek on Monday said it would temporarily limit user registrations "due to large-scale malicious attacks" on its services.
articles.content:
DeepSeek on Monday said it would temporarily limit user registrations "due to large-scale malicious attacks" on its services, though existing users will be able to log in as usual.
